1022.name: NOT_LOCAL_ACCOUNT
1022.message:
The current user already has
a Nintendo Network ID.
1022.short_description: The user you are attempting to link an Nintendo/Pretendo Network ID to already has one linked.
1022.long_description: The user you are attempting to link an Nintendo/Pretendo Network ID to already has one linked.
1022.short_solution: Unlink the account or make a new user.
1022.long_solution: Unlink the account or make a new user.
